com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto

Interface IComponentOpDescriptor


  • public interface IComponentOpDescriptor
    DTO which describes an operation to perform upon a component in a workspace.

      • getKind

        int getKind()
        The kind.
        Returns:
        the kind
        See Also:
        ADD, DROP, REPLACE

      • getComponent

        IComponentHandle getComponent()
        The component.
        Returns:
        a component, never null

      • requiresDetailedReport

        boolean requiresDetailedReport()
        Returns:
        true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.

      • getReplaceOrAddSeed

        IContextHandle getReplaceOrAddSeed()
        Returns:
        the seed, or null if there is no seed

      • getOperationSource

        IWorkspaceHandle getOperationSource()
        Returns:
        the Workspace that should be considered to be the logical source for this operation may be null

      • getHistoryReference

        com.ibm.team.scm.common.IHistoryReference getHistoryReference()
        Return the history reference associated with this component operation, or null if there isn't one.
        Returns:
        the history reference, or null
